prompt:
A boldly alluring Korean woman in her 20s sitting alone on a public stair landing, high-angle
shot from above (waist-up to mid-thigh).
Outfit: brushed-knit fitted top + pleated skirt, matte texture, natural creases.
Pose: one knee raised, one hand gripping the railing, torso subtly arched.
Expression: looking up with a dominant gaze, half-lidded eyes, soft parted lips, no smile.
Lighting: side window spill + pale wall bounce, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
